channel.title: Combined Politepol Feed
channel.description: Merged feed from multiple Politepol sources

item.title: History Today: When the Christmas tree was decorated with electric lights for the first time
FirstUp: Asean foreign ministers’ meet on Thailand–Cambodia tensions, Calcutta HC deadline to submit report on Messi fiasco... headlines today
Why do office parties make introverts uncomfortable?
From Labubus to Trump’s groovy dances, the most LOL moments of 2025
This Week in Explainers: How Bangladesh is being roiled by the killing of Sharif Osman Hadi
History Today: When Pan Am Flight 103 exploded over a Scottish town, killing over 250
2026 outlook: India set to rise amid a turbulent world
item.description: As 2026 approaches, India is expected to continue balancing its interests amid global power competition, seeking strategic partnerships while maintaining strategic autonomy, positioning itself as a major economic and strategic power in a turbulent world

item.title: How Shanti Act unlocks India’s nuclear potential
item.description: The Shanti Act completes the liability architecture that India left unfinished in 2010, transforming nuclear power from a fiscally constrained strategic programme into a bankable infrastructure sector

item.title: Why restraint is India’s best strategy against extremism in Bangladesh
item.description: By responding to extremism with openness, consistency, and strategic long-term view, India not only protects its interests but also underscores the contrast between responsible statecraft and performative radicalism

item.title: How Inqilab Moncho’s Chittagong protest turned Osman Hadi’s death into an anti-India street weapon
item.description: What should have remained a domestic demand for justice was deliberately converted into a strategic provocation, redirecting public anger toward a foreign state without evidence and testing the limits of international diplomatic norms

item.title: Beyond pyramids: Cairo is more than the land of Pharaohs
item.description: From restored Old Cairo to the newly expanded New Cairo, this Egyptian capital is undergoing a sweeping cultural and urban revival

item.title: How PM Modi’s West Asia-Africa visit means big for Global South
item.description: For the global order, India’s manoeuvres underscore a persistent truth. The 21st-century diplomacy will be neither unipolar nor bipolar but matrixed
